com.accela.aa.emse.dom

Class AppSpecificInfoScript

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.accela.aa.emse.dom.service.BaseAAScript
      • com.accela.aa.emse.dom.AppSpecificInfoScript
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.accela.aa.emse.dom.service.AppSpecificInfoScriptService, com.accela.aa.emse.dom.service.ScriptAble

    public class AppSpecificInfoScript
extends com.accela.aa.emse.dom.service.BaseAAScript
implements com.accela.aa.emse.dom.service.AppSpecificInfoScriptService
     
 Accela Automation
 File: AppSpecificInfoScript.java
 
 Accela, Inc.
 Copyright (C): 2002-2014
 
 Description:
 To allow script writer's to access application specific information (select and update).
 
 Notes:
 $Id: AppSpecificInfoScript.java 275377 2014-07-17 08:36:14Z ..\ray.xie $
 
 Revision History:
 10/28/2002, Kelvin Wu, Initial Version
 11/10/2002, Kelvin Wu, modify the methods according the EMSE Phase 4 Correction Document.
 10/08/2003, Sunny Wu,  Add method getCheckboxByCapIDAndGroup(...)
 and editAppSpecInfos(...) for getting and updating task specific info item
 03/07/2005, Peter Lu,  Update methods about AppSpecInfo.
 07/07/2005, Peter Lu,  Fix bug about AppSpecInfo.
 11/01/2006 Michael Mao cache service object.

        newValue - the field new value
        subGroupName - the subGroup name
        oldValue - the field old value
        Returns:
        the script result, if failed and the error type is "2", means the value has been changed by others
